intent_atoms.description: Display tolerant parsing status chips in outline rows and detail inspector to show invalid, partial, corrupted, trimmed, and related node states at a glance.
Outline view models propagate ParseTreeStatusDescriptor through row snapshots.
Detail inspector renders synchronized badges using ParseTreeStatusBadge SwiftUI view.
Tolerant parsing status enums include future states: invalid, empty, trimmed.
ParseTreeStatusDescriptor model is shared across outline rows and detail inspector.
Use ParseTreeStatusBadge SwiftUI view for badge presentation in both outline row and detail inspector.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStatusDescriptor Model
functional_units.description: Provides a shared data model representing the status of tolerant parsing for nodes.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStatusBadge View
functional_units.description: A SwiftUI view that displays a badge indicating the node's parsing status.

functional_units.name: Outline Row Badge Rendering
functional_units.description: Renders synchronized status badges in outline rows based on ParseTreeStatusDescriptor.

functional_units.name: Detail Inspector Badge Rendering
functional_units.description: Displays status badges in the detail inspector for nodes, mirroring the outline row badges.

functional_units.name: Extended Parsing Status Enums
functional_units.description: Adds future parsing states such as invalid, empty, trimmed to the tolerant parsing status enumeration.

functional_units.name: Outline View Model Propagation
functional_units.description: Propagates ParseTreeStatusDescriptor through row snapshots in outline view models.

functional_units.name: Detail Metadata Badge Replacement
functional_units.description: Replaces the detail metadata status row with a badge presentation for node status.

functional_units.name: Corruption Issue Section Header Badge
functional_units.description: Mirrors the same status badge alongside the corruption issue section header for consistency.
